item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Want to talk to us? Feel free to contact anyone on the Leadership Team, or find us on our social media accounts ( Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, & Pinterest). Send an email to CrimsonKindness@gmail.com! Name Email Address Subject Message

item.title: Events
item.description: Below is a calendar of all of our events, including meetings, service activities, team weeks, and more. Have an event suggestion for us? We love new ideas! Send us an email to let us know!

item.title: Teams
item.description: Teams are the heart and soul of Crimson Kindness. Teams consist of fun activities engaging you and others in acts of kindness. Team Leaders will provide an activity at each meeting helping you to spread a little more kindness each time you go. Teams meet every other week on Monday-Wednesday at 7:00 in the Ferguson Center on the 2nd floor. You can pick the team that works best for you, but you are welcome to participate each day you want!

item.title: Join
item.description: If you’re here already, you’re probably pretty passionate about kindness, right? That’s awesome and we would LOVE for you to become a member and participate in our projects. In addition to the steps below we ask that our members come to at least 2 meetings per semester and participate on one of our teams. We can’t wait to meet you! Becoming a member is a two-step process: Step 1: Sign up using this form, and log in with your myBama credentials if asked.

item.title: About
item.description: Crimson Kindness was founded in February of 2013 out of a desire to make our campus a more kind place. Inspired by the Random Acts of Kindness Foundation, Crimson Kindness set out to make a difference on campus and in the Tuscaloosa community. Our Mission The goal of Crimson Kindness on The University of Alabama campus is to create a community of kindness by engaging the student population in acts of kindness and inspiring kindness in our community.

item.title: The Crimson Kindness Blog
item.description: The Crimson Kindness Blog! Share YOUR Random Acts of Kindness Random acts of kindness are happening all over campus everyday. Send an email of a random act of kindness you’ve witnessed to CrimsonKindness@gmail.com and we will feature it on our blog! Name Email Address Subject Your Random Act of Kindness
